system.effect:
I don’t mess around with Zerrikanian fire. Never have, never will. Stuff’s too dangerous. When it hits air the stuff bursts into a horrid green fire. They use a version of this stuff in Zerrikanian fire scorpions.

Zerrikanian Fire immediately sets whatever it touches on fire. 
Throwing it is an Athletics attack with a range equal to your BODYx2m, and it splatters in a 2m cone away from where it lands, lighting anyone and anything in that area on fire.
